param.name: Convert Height to Geoid Height
param.desc: Convert WGS84 height to geoid height (mean sea level) height

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Ignored Interfaces
param.desc: List of interfaces whose services will not be announced

param.name: Loading Order
param.desc: List of messages ordered by loading order

param.name: Reception timeout
param.desc: Maximum amount of seconds to wait for missing fragments in incoming messages

param.name: Transports
param.default: Chlorophyll, Conductivity, CpuUsage, Current, Depth, Distance, EntityState, Fluorescein, FuelLevel, GpsFix, Heartbeat, LblConfig, LblRange, LblRangeAcceptance, Phycocyanin, Phycoerythrin, PowerChannelState, Pressure, RhodamineDye, RSSI, Rpm, Salinity, SoundSpeed, StorageUsage, Temperature, Turbidity, Voltage, PH, Redox

param.name: Active
param.desc: True to activate task, false otherwise

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the modem

param.name: Mailbox Check - Periodicity
param.desc: Amount of time without alert rings or MT SBDs before doing a mailbox check

param.name: Flush Interval
param.desc: Number of second to wait before forcing data to be written to disk

param.name: Transports
param.default: Abort, Announce, AcousticLink, AcousticOperation, CommSystemsQuery, CpuUsage, Current, Depth, DevDataText, EntityList, EntityState, EstimatedState, FuelLevel, GpsFix, Heartbeat, IndicatedSpeed, IridiumMsgRx, IridiumMsgTx, IridiumTxStatus, LblRange, LblRangeAcceptance, LogBookControl, LogBookEntry, PlanControl, PlanControlState, PowerChannelControl, RemoteSensorInfo, RSSI, StorageUsage, TelemetryMsg, Temperature, TextMessage, UamRxFrame, UamTxFrame, UamTxStatus, UamRxRange, UsblAnglesExtended, UsblPositionExtended, UsblFixExtended, UsblModem, UsblConfig, VehicleState, Voltage, VtolState

param.name: Active
param.desc: True to activate task, false otherwise

param.name: DynDNS Update Periodicity
param.desc: Number of seconds between dynamic DNS updates

param.desc: URL used to update dynamic DNS

param.name: Active
param.desc: True to activate task, false otherwise

param.name: Serial Port - Device
param.desc: Serial port device used to communicate with the sensor

param.name: Address Section
param.desc: Name of the configuration section with vehicle addresses

param.name: Duty cycle
param.desc: Duty cycle - the percentage of time to allow transmit

param.name: Radio Error correction
param.desc: Radio Error correction - this reduces bandwidth

param.name: Enable telemetry report
param.desc: Enable system state telemetry reporting. When enabled, systems shall acknowledge reception of requests to broadcast Reports messages containing the overall state of the system. When disabled, those requests shall be ignored

param.name: Local Port
param.desc: Local UDP port to listen on

param.name: Static Destinations
param.desc: List of <IPv4>:<Port> destinations that will always receive outgoing messages

param.name: Filtered Entities
param.desc: List of <Message>:<Entity>+<Entity> that define the source entities allowed to pass message of a specific message type.

param.name: Announce Service
param.desc: Announce this transport to services or not

param.name: Underwater Communications
param.desc: Allow underwater communication when limited comms are being simulated

param.name: Transports
param.default: Abort, AcousticOperation, AcousticSystemsQuery, AcousticSystems, CommSystemsQuery, CpuUsage, Current, Depth, Distance, EntityList, EntityParameters, EntityState, EstimatedState, FuelLevel, GpsFix, Heartbeat, IndicatedSpeed, IridiumMsgRx, IridiumMsgTx, IridiumTxStatus, LblRange, LblRangeAcceptance, LogBookControl, LoggingControl, NavigationUncertainty, PlanControl, PlanControlState, RemoteSensorInfo, RSSI, StateReport, StorageUsage, TelemetryMsg, Temperature, TextMessage, UsblAnglesExtended, UsblPositionExtended, UsblFixExtended, UsblModem, UsblConfig, VehicleState, Voltage, VtolState

param.name: Always Transmitted Messages
param.desc: List of messages that will always be transmitted disregarding communication limitations

param.name: Local Messages Only
param.desc: Only transmit messsages from local system.

param.name: Custom Service Type
param.desc: Optional custom service type (imc+udp+<Custom Service Type>), empty entry gives default service (imc+udp)

param.name: Command - On Power Down
param.desc: Command to execute before powering down

param.name: Command - On Power Down Abort
param.desc: Command to execute when powering down sequence is aborted
